a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: The deviation in a specific month's average surface temperature from the mean temperature of the same month
during the period 1991-2020, measured in degrees Celsius.
Data source: Contains modified Copernicus Climate Change Service information (2019)
Note: Note that the seasons are represented according to Northern Hemisphere months. In the Southern Hemisphere, these months
